channel.title: How to lower a server lag
channel.description:
Yes i have a lag on my server but it not to bad i just want get [glow=red,2,300]reduce[/glow] it so i can have more players without people [glow=red,2,300]crying[/glow] about it
any suggestion on what to do or ideas.
